title: 04/14/2021 - DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/14/2021 - DPS Best Of
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress are filling in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes, weighing in on Julian Edelman's retirement and explaining why he shouldn't make it into the Hall of Fame. They discuss using the n-word when playing professional sports following the altercation between Dennis Schoder and Kyrie Irving and they debate whether or not the Cowboys' window for winning a Super Bowl has closed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
